Class Kennel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Kennel

  • public class Kennel
extends java.lang.Object
    To model a Kennel - a collection of dogs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Kennel()
      Creates a kennel with a default size 20
      Kennel(int capacity)
      Create a kennel
